title: Void Bag
summaries: The Void Bag is a portable storage item that grants the player access to the Void Vault anywhere. When used, it will summon a temporary portal which lasts for 3 minutes, and pressing ⚷ Open / Activate on the portal opens the player's Void Vault inventory. The Void Bag is never consumed and can be used limitlessly.
Pressing ⚷ Open / Activate on the Void Bag item in the inventory turns it into the Closed Void Bag. Pressing the button again opens the Void Bag again.

When opened, the Void Vault storage will effectively act as the player's secondary inventory, which automatically stores items collected after the player's main inventory is full, indicated by purple pickup text. Additionally, it also allows the player to interact with the items inside it as if they were in the main inventory without opening the Void Vault storage interface.

When closed, the Void Bag functions similarly to the <linked>Money Trough</linked>, only acting as a regular <linked>portable storage</linked> item. This will prevent it from picking up items when the player has a full inventory, and it loses the function of the secondary inventory.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons the void vault
Functions as an extended inventory when open
May pick up overflowing items when open
Right click to close
'This pocket dimension is out of this world!'
statistics.Sell: 2 GC
